text: 1.5: Zo 13.34; 15.12; 15.17; 1 Pi 4.8; 1 Zo 2.7-8; 3.11; 3.23Ndu Fhe Bakɨme farasarigi mbik, gu buna mueŋ ndun ki. Gu khueŋ vuzvugi, nde mba buneŋ zɨn ŋgɨri. Mba buneŋ khare, nza guigira wari won ndavir zam harigi ntɨɨri nɨɨnga. Gu khar tɨvar kameŋ khergiap, ndu ndi mbav, ne zɨn ŋgɨr zav ndu nzuai fhuvara. Nza fhum kha tɨva kaŋgi.
